item.title: (WIP) Probabilistic programming with problog
item.description: Syntactic sugar Clauses can be constructed by virtue of overloading of Python operators: Prolog Python English etymology :- « clause infers , & and ; | or \+ ~ not A small Tangent Some mathematical symbols symbol tex how it reads <: {\displaystyle <:} is a subtype of ⊧ \vDash entails ⊢ \vdash infers → → is mapped to maps sets to sets ↦ \mapsto is mapped to maps elements to elements Some jq.
